channel.title: [HELP]How To Make A Non-wilderness Area a wilderness are [DELTA]

item.title: [HELP]How To Make A Non-wilderness Area a wilderness are [DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

Get the coordinates of the area that you want to make into a wilderness area.

You need to get the SW corner and NE corner, like a box.

Then choose if you want it to be single, type == 1 or multi, type == 2.

Read full topic
item.source: [HELP]How To Make A Non-wilderness Area a wilderness are [DELTA]

item.title: [HELP]How To Make A Non-wilderness Area a wilderness are [DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @rofllewisrofl rofllewisrofl
item.description:
@rofllewisrofl wrote:

Alright, I don’t know what to do using Delta, Since I’ve never used Delta. I searched public boolean isinWilderness

And I got This:

[code]public boolean isInWilderness(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) {
	if (Type == 1) {
		if ((coordY >= 3523) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392)
				&& (coordX >= 2942) || absX >= 3220 && absX <= 3299 && absY >= 3520 && absY <=3548 || absX >= 2377 && absX <= 2429 && absY >= 3070 && absY <=3143 || absX >= 2250 && absX <= 2296 && absY >= 4676 && absY <=4715) {
			return true;
		}
	} else if (Type == 2) {
		if ((coordY >= 3512) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392)
				&& (coordX >= 2942)) {
			return true;
		}[/code]

What Am I supposed too do? What do I search. I want to make a non-wilderness area a Wilderness Area.

Read full topic
